nodes.text: The Besberra arena was a gladiatorial arena on the planet Besberra. Sometime before 3643 BBY, a Houk named Torog fought for five straight hours in the arena, defeating waves of opponents and wild animals before dropping dead. An autopsy of the Houk revealed that he had been fighting for four hours with a broken neck, earning Torog posthumous fame.
The Besberra arena was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Houk species in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
